title: Tech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Washington Post confirms data breach linked to Oracle hacks
items.description: The Washington Post is the latest victim of a hacking campaign by the notorious Clop ransomware gang, which relied on vulnerabilities in Oracle softwa...

items.title: The Best Gifts for Sleep, as Tested by Our Team
items.description: Sleep is the one thing every giftee needs, and you can help them get it. These are our tried-and-tested picks for giftable sleep aids, from masks to m...

items.title: I tried the Apple Crossbody Strap. It’s convenient, but the phone looks silly when the strap is removed.
items.description: Apple's new Crossbody Strap is a convenient way to go hands-free but the strap can rub uncomfortably at times, and the phone looks silly when the stra...

items.title: Rivian gives RJ Scaringe a new pay package worth up to $5B
items.description: The company canceled a similar-sized award from 2021, when EV optimism was sky-high, due to the "unlikeliness" that the associated goals could be met.

items.title: GoWish’s shopping and wishlist app is having its biggest year yet
items.description: GoWish, an app for making wishlists, is having a record year, and has doubled its users.

items.title: Amazon launches a low-price standalone shopping app, Amazon Bazaar, in over a dozen markets
items.description: On Friday, Amazon announced the debut of Amazon Bazaar, a new low-cost shopping destination for Asia, Africa, and Latin America that will be available...

items.title: Texas AG sues Roblox, accusing it of prioritizing ‘pixel pedophiles’ over child safety
items.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton late on Thursday said he had sued online gaming platform Roblox, accusing the company of "deceiving parents about th...

items.title: How one founder plans to save cities from flooding with terraforming robots
items.description: Instead of building seawalls or dikes, Terranova has developed a new way to raise cities to protect them from sea level rise.

items.title: Seven more families are now suing OpenAI over ChatGPT’s role in suicides, delusions
items.description: In one case, 23-year-old Zane Shamblin had a conversation with ChatGPT that lasted more than four hours.

items.title: 7 Best Shower Water Filters (2025), WIRED Tested and Approved
items.description: We tested leading filtered showerheads, from Jolie to Canopy to Hydroviv. The winners were clear.
